snippet: After a career-worst 40th-place finish at the Masters and a missed cut a week ago, Tiger Woods is facing criticism from all corners at the Players Championship.
lead_paragraph: PONTE VEDRA BEACH, Fla. -- Tiger Woods's past two trips to the Players Championship ended with him withdrawing from the PGA Tour's signature tournament because of injuries. To stick around for 72 holes this week, Woods may have to overcome a shaky swing and a fragile psyche. On Tuesday at TPC Sawgrass, Woods did not sound concerned. He is the only one.

headline.main: Woods Facing Criticism and Tough Course at the Players
